attributes.action: Allow standing sections in football grounds in UK to improve the atmosphere.
attributes.additional_details:
Below is a link from a YouTube channel called copa90 and explains how these sections work and how benificial they are to improving the athmosphere.
https://youtu.be/rAqa-auSn8w
attributes.background: We need standing sections in football grounds to improve the athmsosphere recently the athmosphere in the grounds have been poor with fans told to be seated and quiet, but a standing area would safe and allow for a true athmosphere. Germany have them and there athmosphere is great, now we need them.
